title: Activists Protest At French Embassy In Abuja, Demand End To 'Prolonged Imperialist War' In Ukraine
desc: Activists under the banner of the ‘Comrades’ Anti-Imperialist Campaign’ on Friday stormed the French Embassy in Nigeria’s capital, demanding an immediate end to France's military support that was fuelling the Ukrainian war.

title: UN rights chief optimistic on TZ’s handling of challenges
desc: GENEVA: THE United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights, Mr Volker Türk, has expressed confidence in Tanzania’s ability to address recent challenges constructively, praising the government’s commitment to dialogue, reconciliation and respect for the rule of law. title: Madison Chock and Evan Bates reign supreme in Olympic team event
desc: Madison Chock and Evan Bates took first place in the Olympic team event final ice dance segment – the free dance. They earned the maximum 10 points for Team USA.

title: Former French minister Lang resigns from Arab World Institute after Epstein correspondence revealed
desc: Jack Lang, a former French culture minister, has resigned as president of the Arab World Institute, the French Foreign Affairs Ministry said on Saturday, after revelations of his past contacts with Jeffrey Epstein and the launch of a financial investigation.

title: Nuclear sees tipping point as Meta makes deals with Bill Gates’ TerraPower, Sam Altman-backed Oklo
